summary: A journey inside Martin's head. He's on a weekend mountain trip, and we get to know his thoughts. Unsensored, essential, existential and silly about feelings and fantasies. A recognizable film about being human, and how we tick and think.
cast: Ole Giæver|Marte Magnusdotter Solem|Sivert Giæver Solem|Rebekka Nystabakk|Ellen Birgitte Winther|Per Kjerstad|John Sigurd Kristensen|Kim Sørensen|Hege Aga Edelsteen|William Bache-Wiig|Trond Peter Stamsø Munch|Frida Helland|Harald Erdal|Ester Marie Grenersen|Stine N. Andersen|Marit Thrana|Ellinor Giæver Solem
title: Mot naturen
